articles.title: ‘Nobody would've imagined that Kohli…’: Ex-IND star picks top 5 T20I batters - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former India opener has hailed the transformation that Kohli underwent from wretched form to reaching the peak. On his YouTube channel, he rated the top five T20I batters in 2022, and gave Kohli the third position in his list. | Cricket
